summary: Sir Ringo Starr finds himself the human sacrifice target of a cult, and his fellow members of The Beatles must try to protect him from it.
cast: The Beatles|Leo McKern|Eleanor Bron|Victor Spinetti|Roy Kinnear|John Bluthal|Patrick Cargill|Alfie Bass|Warren Mitchell|Peter Copley|Bruce Lacey|Danny Almond|Thomas Baptiste|Ronnie Brody|Peter Brooks|Blake Butler|Golda Casimir|Vera Cook|Deborah DeLacey|Durra|Eve Eden|Mal Evans|Rupert Evans|Mary Ford|Gretchen Franklin|Joe Gibbons|Bob Godfrey|Bob Grant|Stewart Guidotti|George Harrison|Jack Hetherington|Frankie Howerd|Jenny Landry|John Lennon|Jeremy Lloyd|Alex MacIntosh|Andreas Malandrinos|John Louis Mansi|Marie-Lise|Paul McCartney|Zienia Merton|Allan Mitchell|Dandy Nichols|Zorenah Osborne|Sue Reid|Wendy Richard|Patty Roberts|Edith Saville|Nicole Shelby|Wally Shufflebottom|Roy Spencer|Ringo Starr|Bill Strange|Jenny Till|Glenda Warrington|Ian Wilson|Gai Wright
